entry.title: $2100 // ------->30TH AVENUE DUPLEXBRAND NEW<-------
entry.content:
------->30TH AVENUE DUPLEX<-------->BRAND NEW<-------

Listing ID #: 167592
Price: $2,100
Property Type: Apartment
Bedrooms: 1.0
Bathrooms: 1.0
Pets: No Pets

Apartment Amenities

Duplex
High Ceilings
Multi Level

New development down the block from the 30th Avenue cafes and lounges. 1 bedroom duplex with king bedroom and 2 baths. Bright throughout and large windows. Open style kitchen with stainless steel appliances included. The windows are large allowing for lots of natural lighting.

Located 30 seconds off of 30th Avenue. Walk to brunch on the weekends and happy hours during the week. Groceries, shopping, dining, and more are on 30th. Subway 5 minutes away. 7 minute commute to Midtown.

For viewings call Frank at 646-335-6190 or email [email protected]
